summary: Provides a suite of automated benchmark tests that evaluate model training and inference performance across various configurations such as encoder‑decoder architectures, half‑precision (fp16), TorchScript, and custom settings, while also checking result integrity and recording metrics.
business_intent: Helps developers and data scientists validate and optimize machine‑learning models by measuring speed, memory usage, and correctness under different deployment scenarios, facilitating performance tuning and reliable releases.
